about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Building excellence since 1985
about.story: BuildCo was founded in 1985 by John Anderson with a vision to transform the construction industry through innovation and quality. What started as a small residential construction company has grown into one of the region's most trusted construction firms.

team.title: Our Leadership Team
team.subtitle: Meet the experts leading our company

bios.johnAnderson: John Anderson is the Founder and CEO of BuildCo. With decades of experience in the construction industry, he has led the company from its humble beginnings to its current position as a leader in the market.
bios.sarahWilliams: Sarah Williams is the Chief Operations Officer at BuildCo. She is responsible for overseeing the company's day-to-day operations and ensuring that all projects are completed on time and within budget.
bios.michaelChen: Michael Chen is the Chief Technology Officer at BuildCo. He is responsible for leading the company's technology strategy and ensuring that BuildCo remains at the forefront of innovation in the construction industry.
